function.name: refrigerationTemperature_getValue
function.description: This function is used to retrieve the current temperature of the refrigerator's refrigerating compartment.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to get the temperature.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to get the temperature (e.g., refrigerating compartment).
